description: I don’t know what it is about the character ਊ that makes it look so much like a laughing mouth but these dongers all use it. I especially like the ones that are pointing and laughing. The mouths themselves look funny so this works perfect for laughing emoticons. Find one that suits you best and use it to express your laughter.  ꉂ (๑¯ਊ¯)σ (灬㋭ ਊ ㋲灬) (;うਊ ՞) ( ՞ਊ ՞)☞ ｡ﾟ(ﾟ＾ਊ＾ํ )ﾟ｡ (☞ ՞ਊ ՞)☞ ( ՞ਊ՞) (⁙ູ՟ິͫ◞̴ਊ◟̴ູ՟ິͫ⁙ູ) (,, ՞ਊ ՞)=☞)՞ਊ ՞) (΄◞ิਊ◟ิ‵) (खਉख) v(＜°＞ਊ ＜°＞)v ( ╹ਊ╹) (⁙ู꒪ู︠͒◞̴ਊ◟̴ู꒪︡͒⁙ู) (((; ఠ ਉ ఠ)) ┌( •́ ਊ •̀ )┐ *･゜ﾟ･*:.｡.｡.:*･’(´◜◞ਊ◟◝｀)’･*:.｡.｡.:*･゜ﾟ･*
title: ਊ Style Mouths
